mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEALS M LEFT JOIN USERS U ON (M.USER_ID = U.USER_ID) ORDER BY M.NO

SELECT U.NICK_NAME, U.PROFILE_IMG_PATH, M.*, (SELECT F.FOLLOWEE_ID FROM FOLLOW F JOIN MEALS M ON (F.FOLLOWEE_ID = M.USER_ID AND F.FOLLOWER_ID = #{userId} AND M.NO = #{no})) AS FOLLOWEE_ID FROM USERS U LEFT JOIN MEALS M ON (U.USER_ID = M.USER_ID) WHERE M.NO = #{no} ORDER BY M.NO
